title: Chatbot with PyTorch ðŸ¤–
description: The architecture used was a feedforward network (very simple). The network receives a input vector as a result of preprocessing (length equal to size of bag of words). Subsequently, it shows the user a random response (from the json file) based on that category.

title: Snake with PyTorch ðŸ”¥
description: The agent will learn to find the right way to get to his reward (food); to do this, it will use DQN techniques, which combine Bellman's equations and neural networks for estimating the Q values. The agent was built with PyTorch, while the game environment was built with PyGame (if you want you can opt for GYM).

title: Reinforced Learning
description: Models of RL using GYM and Pytorch.

title: faceAcecom
description: Summer 2020 project on facial recognition with Tensorflow.

title: Deep Learning Collection
description: Implementations to learn about ML, DL, PyTorch and TensorFlow from basic to advanced level.
